title: Manage the Trade Deadline
description: On the league's trade deadline day, an administrator must process all last-minute trades before the cutoff time.

tasks.description: Monitor the incoming trade submissions from teams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees a high volume of trades being submitted.

tasks.description: For each trade, verify that it is compliant with all league rules (e.g., salary cap, roster limits).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews each trade and flags one that is non-compliant.

tasks.description: Approve all compliant trades and notify the non-compliant team of the issue.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent approves valid trades and informs the other team why their trade was rejected.

tasks.description: At the deadline, officially close the trade window.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent closes the system to any new trade submissions.
